name: Deathtouch
description: Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.

name: Defender
description: This creature can't attack.

name: Double Strike
description: This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.

name: Enchant
description: This card can only be attached to a specific type of card or a player.

name: Equip
description: Attach this permanent to target creature you control that matches a quality for the shown cost. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: First Strike
description: This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.

name: Flash
description: You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.

name: Flying
description: This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying and/or reach.

name: Haste
description: This creature can attack and tap itself as soon as it comes under your control.

name: Hexproof
description: This permanent can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control. Can also specify that this ability only works on certain card types.

name: Indestructible
description: Damage and effects that say 'destroy' don't destroy this.

name: Intimidate
description: This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.

name: Landwalk
description: This creature can't be blocked as long as the defending player controls a specific type of card.

name: Lifelink
description: Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.

name: Reach
description: This creature can block creatures with flying.

name: Trample
description: This creature can deal excess combat damage to a player, planeswalker or battle it's attacking.

name: Vigilance
description: Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap

name: Ward
description: Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays the cost listed.

name: Attach
description: To move an Aura, Equipment, or Fortification onto another object or player.

name: Counter
description: Negate the effect/activation of a chosen spell and put it into the graveyard.

name: Exile
description: Put a card into the Exile zone, removing it from the game outside of specific effects.

name: Mill
description: Put cards from the top of the library equal to the listed value into the graveyard.

name: Regenerate
description: The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.

name: Sacrifice
description: To move a permanent you control to its owner's graveyard.

name: Scry
description: Look at a certain number of cards from the top of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.

name: Search
description: To look at all cards in your library and find a card that matches the given description.

name: Tap
description: Turn a permanent 90 degrees to either use an activated ability, declare a creature as an attacker, or pay the cost for some kind of ability.

name: Banding
description: Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creature with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.

name: Rampage
description: Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gains +X/+X until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.

name: Cumulative Upkeep
description: At the beginning of your upkeep, if this permanent is on the battlefield, put an age counter on this permanent. Then you may pay the listed cost for each age counter on it. If you don't, sacrifice it.

name: Flanking
description: Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

name: Phasing
description: This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.

name: Phase Out
description: While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.

name: Buyback
description: You may pay an additional cost as you cast this spell. If the buyback cost was paid, put this spell into its owner's hand instead of into that player's graveyard as it resolves.

name: Shadow
description: This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with Shadow.

name: Cycling
description: You may pay the listed cost to discard this card, then draw another card.

name: Echo
description: At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.

name: Horsemanship
description: This creatuer can't be blocked except by creatures with hrosemanship.

name: Fading
description: This permanent enters the battle field with a number of fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.

name: Kicker
description: You may pay an additional cost as you cast this spell.

name: Multikicker
description: You may pay an additional cost any number of times as you cast this spell.

name: Flashback
description: You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.

name: Madness
description: If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.

name: Fear
description: This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.

name: Morph
description: You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for 3 mana. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.

name: Megamorph
description: You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for 3 mana. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Amplify
description: As this creature enters the battlefield, put a number of +1/+1 counters on it for each creature card with a certain type you reveal in your hand.

name: Provoke
description: Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.

name: Storm
description: When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.

name: Affinity
description: This spell costs 1 less mana to cast for each specified permanent you control.

name: Entwine
description: If you pay the entwine cost when casting a spell, you may choose all options instead of only one option.

name: Modular
description: This enters with a number of +1/+1 counters on it. When it dies, you may put its +1/+1 counters on target artifact creature.

name: Sunburst
description: This enters with either a +1/+1 or charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.

name: Bushido
description: Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gains +X/+X until the end of the turn.

name: Soulshift
description: When this creature dies, you may return target Spirit card with a mana value equal to a specified value or less from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Splice
description: As you cast a specific type of spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.

name: Offering
description: You may cast this card any time you could cast an instant by sacrificing a specific subtype of spell and paying the difference in mana cost between this card and the sacrified card. Mana cost includes color.

name: Ninjutsu
description: Pay the listed cost, then return an unblocked attacker you control to your hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.

name: Epic
description: For the rest of the game, you can't cast spells. At the beginning of each of your upkeeps, copy this spell except for its epic ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

name: Convoke
description: Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for 1 colorless mana or 1 mana of that creature's color

name: Dredge
description: If you would draw a card, you may instead mill a certan number of cards. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Transmute
description: Pay the listed cost and discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.

name: Bloodthirst
description: If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this permanent enters with a certain number of +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Haunt
description: When this creature dies, exile it, haunting target creature.

name: Replicate
description: When yo ucast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.

name: Forecast
description: Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.

name: Graft
description: This creature enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may move a +1/+1 counter from this creature onto it.

name: Recover
description: When a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay the listed cost. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Otherwise, exile this card.

name: Ripple
description: When you cast this spell, you may reveal a number of cards from the top of your library. You may cast any revealed cards with the same name as this spell without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.

name: Split Second
description: As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.

name: Suspend
description: Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay its Suspend cost and exile it with a number of time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last one is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.

name: Vanishing
description: This permanent enters with a number of time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it

name: Absorb
description: If a source would deal damage to this creature, prevent a certain amount of that damage.

name: Aura Swap
description: Pay a specified cost: Exchange this Aura with an Aura card in your hand.

name: Delve
description: Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for 1 colorless mana.

name: Fortify
description: Pay a specified cost: Attach this Fortification to target land you control. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Frenzy
description: Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

name: Gravestorm
description: When you cast this spell, copy it for each permanent put into a graveyard this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.

name: Poisonous
description: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a certain number of poison counters.

name: Transfigure
description: Pay the specified cost and sacrifice this permanent: Search your library for a creature card with the same mana value as this permanent, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Transfigure only as a sorcery.

name: Champion
description: When this enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you exile another creature you control. When this leaves the battlefield, that card returns to the battlefield.

name: Changeling
description: This card is every creature type.

name: Evoke
description: You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.

name: Hideaway
description: When this permanent enters, look at a certain number of cards from the top of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.

name: Prowl
description: You may cast this for its prowl cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with a subtype of creature.

name: Reinforce
description: Pay the specified cost and discard this card: Put a number of +1/+1 counters on target creature.

name: Conspire
description: As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.

name: Persist
description: When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control with a -1/-1 counter on it.

name: Wither
description: This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.

name: Retrace
description: You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card as an additional cost to cast it.

name: Devour
description: As this enters, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with X times that many +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Exalted
description: Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each instance of exalted among permanents you control.

name: Unearth
description: Pay the specified cost: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.

name: Cascade
description: When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Annihilator
description: Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices a certain number of permanents.

name: Level Up
description: Pay a specified cost: Put a level counter on this. Level up only as a sorcery.

name: Rebound
description: If this spell was cast from your hand, instead of putting it into your graveyard as it resolves, exile it and, at the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.

name: Umbra Armor
description: If enchanted permanent would be destroyed, instead remove all damage marked on it and destroy this Aura.

name: Infect
description: This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.

name: Battle Cry
description: Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Living Weapon
description: When this Equipment enters, create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token, then attach this Equipment to it.

name: Undying
description: When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Miracle
description: You may cast this card for its Miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.

name: Soulbond
description: You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.

name: Overload
description: You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of 'target' with 'each'.

name: Scavenge
description: Pay the specified cost and exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.

name: Unleash
description: You may have this creature enter with a +1/+1 counter on it. It can't block as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Cipher
description: When you cast this spell, you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of this card without paying its mana cost.

name: Evolve
description: Whenever a creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

name: Extort
description: Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay 1 white or black mana. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.

name: Fuse
description: You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.

name: Bestow
description: If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.

name: Tribute
description: As this creature enters, an opponent of your choice may place a certain number of +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Dethrone
description: Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Hidden Agenda
description: Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name a card. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen name.

name: Double Agenda
description: Start the game with this conspiracy face down in the command zone and secretly name two different cards. You may turn this conspiracy face up any time and reveal the chosen names.

name: Outlast
description: Pay the specified cost and tap this card: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Prowess
description: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Dash
description: You may cast this spell for its dash cost. If you do, it gains haste, and it's returned from the battlefield to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Exploit
description: When this creature enters, you may sacrifice a creature.

name: Menace
description: This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.

name: Renown
description: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, if it isn't renowned, put a number of +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes renowned.

name: Awaken
description: If you cast this card for the listed cost, also put a number of +1/+1 counters on target land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

name: Devoid
description: This card has no color.

name: Ingest
description: Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library

name: Myriad
description: Whenever this creature attacks, for each opponent other than defending player, you may create a token that's a copy of this creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. If one or more tokens are created this way, exile the tokens at end of combat.

name: Surge
description: You may cast a spell for its Surge cost if you or a teammate have cast another spell in the same turn.

name: Skulk
description: This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.

name: Emerge
description: You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.'

name: Escalate
description: This card has multiple modes you can choose. Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.

name: Melee
description: Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 power until end of turn for each opponent you attacked with a creature this combat.

name: Crew
description: Tap any number of other untapped creatures you control with total power X or greater: This permanent becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.

name: Fabricate
description: When this permanent enters the battlefield, you may put a number of +1/+1 counters on it. If you don't, create that number of 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.

name: Partner
description: You can have two commanders if both have partner.

name: Partner with
description: When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put the named card into their hand from their library, then shuffle.

name: Undaunted
description: This spell costs 1 less to cast for each opponent.

name: Improvise
description: Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for 1 colorless mana.

name: Aftermath
description: Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.

name: Embalm
description: Pay a specified cost and exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a white Zombie with no mana cost. Embalm only as a sorcery.

name: Eternalize
description: Pay a specified cost and exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie with no mana cost. Eternalize only as a sorcery.

name: Afflict
description: When this creature becomes blocked, the defending player loses a certain amount of life.

name: Ascend
description: If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game

name: Assist
description: Another player can pay up to a certain amount of this spell's cost.

name: Jump-Start
description: You may cast this spell from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.

name: Mentor
description: Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.

name: Afterlife
description: When this creature dies, create a certain amount of 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token(s) with flying.

name: Riot
description: This creature enters with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.

name: Spectacle
description: You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.

name: Escape
description: You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.

name: Companion
description: If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for 3 colorless mana any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Mutate
description: If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.

name: Encore
description: Pay a specific cost and exile this card from your graveyard: For each opponent, create a token copy that attacks that opponent this turn if able. They gain haste. Sacrifice them at the beginning of the next end step. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: Boast
description: Activate this ability only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.

name: Foretell
description: During your turn, you may pay 2 colorless mana and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.

name: Demonstrate
description: When you cast this spell, you may copy it. If you do, choose an opponent to also copy it. Players may choose new targets for their copies.

name: Daybound
description: If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.

name: Nightbound
description: If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.

name: Disturb
description: You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its distrub cost.

name: Decayed
description: This creature can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at the end of combat.

name: Cleave
description: You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.

name: Training
description: Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greating power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

name: Compleated
description: Phyrexian hybrid mana can be paid with X, Y, or 2 life. For each Phyrexian hybrid mana paid with life, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.

name: Reconfigure
description: Pay a specific cost and attach this card to target creature you control or unattach from a creature. Reconfigure only as a sorcery. While attached this card isn't a creature.

name: Blitz
description: If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and 'When this creature dies, draw a card.' Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Casualty
description: As you cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature with power X (or more). When you do, copy this spell.

name: Enlist
description: As this creature attacks, you may tap a nonattacking creature you control without summoning sickness. When you do, add its power to this creature's until end of turn.

name: Read Ahead
description: Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after III.'

name: Ravenous
description: This creature enters with +1/+1 counters on it equal to extra mana spent on this spell. If the extra mana spent equals 5 or more, draw a card when it enters.

name: Squad
description: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay the specified cost any number of times. When this creature enters the battlefield, create that many tokens that are copies of it.

name: Visit
description: At the beginning of your main phase, roll a six sided die. If the result is lit up on any Attractions you control, you may trigger their abilities.

name: Prototype
description: You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.

name: Living Metal
description: As long as it's your turn, this Vehicle is also a creature.

name: More Than Meets the Eye
description: You may cast this card converted for a specified cost.

name: For Mirrodin!
description: When this equipment enters, create a 2/2 red Rebel creature token, then attach this to it.

name: Toxic
description: Players dealt damage by this creature also get a certain number of poison counters.

name: Backup
description: When this creature enters, put a number of +1/+1 counters on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the listed abilities until the end of your turn.

name: Bargain
description: You may sacrifice an artifact, enchantment, or token as you cast this spell.

name: Craft
description: Pay the specified cost, exile this artifact, and exile a card of the listed type you control or from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.

name: Disguise
description: You may cast this face down card for 3 colorless mana as a 2/2 creature with ward 2. Turn it face up any time for its disguise cost.

name: Solved
description: At the beginning of your end step, if a certain condition is met and this Case is not solved, it becomes solved.

name: Plot
description: You may pay the specified cost and exile this card from your hand. Cast it as a sorcery on a later turn without paying its mana cost. Plot only as a sorcery.

name: Saddle
description: tap any number of other creatures you control with total power X or more: This Mount becomes saddled until end of turn. Saddle only as a sorcery.

name: Spree
description: Choose one or more additional costs, then use all effects in order.

name: Freerunning
description: You may cast a spell for its freerunning cost if you dealt combat damage to a player this turn with an Assassin or commander.

name: Gift
description: You may promise an opponent a gift as you cast this spell. If you do, they get what you're gifting them.

name: Offspring
description: You may pay an additional cost as you cast this spell. If you do, when this creature enters, create a 1/1 token copy of it.

name: Impending
description: If you cast this spell for its impending cost, it enters with a number of time counters and isn't a creature until the last is removed. At the beginning of your end step, remove a time counter from it.'

name: Fateseal
description: Look at a number of cards from the top of an opponent's library, then put any number of them on the bottom of that player's library and the rest on top in any order.

name: Clash
description: Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.

name: Planeswalk
description: Put each face up plane or phenomenon card on the bottom of its owner's planar decfk, face down, then move the top card of your planar deck off that planar deck and turn it face up. Only used in Planechase format.

name: Set in Motion
description: Move a scheme card off the top of your scheme deck and turn it face up.

name: Abandon
description: Turn a face-up ongoing scheme card face down and put it on the bottom of its owner's scheme deck.

name: Proliferate
description: Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.

name: Transform
description: Turn a double-faced card on the back side, changing the card face that is visible and active.

name: Detain
description: Until your next turn, the chosen permanent can't attack or block and its activated abilities can't be activated.

name: Populate
description: Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.

name: Monstrosity
description: If this permanent isn't monsterous, put a number of +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.

name: Vote
description: Players vote for the chosen effect/target before it resolves.

name: Bolster
description: Choose a creature you control with the least toughness or tied for the least toughness among creatures you control. Put a number of +1/+1 counters on that creature.

name: Manifest
description: Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.

name: Manifest Dread
description: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature and the other into your graveyard. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it’s a creature card.

name: Support
description: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X other target creatures.

name: Investigate
description: Create a Clue token. It's an artiffact with 'Spend 2 colorless mana and sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.'

name: Meld
description: Combine two meld cards into one oversized card if you control the proper pair.

name: Goad
description: Until your next turn, the goaded creature attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.

name: Exert
description: An exerted permanent won't untap during your next untap step.

name: Explore
description: Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back on top or into your graveyard.

name: Assemble
description: Put the top card of your Contraption deck face up onto one of your sprockets.

name: Surveil
description: Look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.

name: Adapt
description: If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, pay the listed cost and put a number of +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Amass
description: Put a number of +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also the listed subtype. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Army creature token of the chosen subtype first.

name: Learn
description: You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.

name: Venture into the Dungeon
description: Enter the first room or advance to the next room of the dungeon.

name: Venture into X
description: If you're in a dungeon, advance to the next room. If you're not, enter X. Enter the first room or advance to the next room.

name: Connive
description: Draw a number of cards, then discard the same number. Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature for each nonland card discarded this way.

name: Open an Attraction
description: Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.

name: Convert
description: Turn a double-sided card over to its other side.

name: Incubate
description: Create an Incubator token with a number of +1/+1 counters on it and the ability 'Spend 2 colorless mana and transform this artifact.' It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.

name: The Ring Tempts You
description: As the Ring tempts you, you get an emblem named The Ring if you don't have one. Then, your emblem gains its next ability and you choose a creature you control to become or remain your Ring-bearer.

name: Face a Villainous Choice
description: Your opponent must choose between one of two effects.

name: Time Travel
description: For each suspended card you own and each permanent you control with a time counter on it, you may add or remove a time counter.

name: Discover
description: Exile card from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with a specified mana value or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.

name: Cloak
description: Put it onto the battlefield as a 2/2 creature with ward 2. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.

name: Collect Evidence
description: Exile cards with a specified total mana value or greater from your graveyard.

name: Suspect
description: Target a creature, they become suspected. A suspected creature has menace and can't block.

name: Forage
description: Exile three cards from your graveyard or sacrifice a Food.
